title: Sync error: Failed to derive block receipts fields
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version erigon version 2022.07.4-alpha `
OS & Version:  `Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (GNU/Linux 5.15.0-1013-aws x86_64)`
Commit hash :  `d88fc8242789a5f6df0ce77168e473715178d6df ` - Release https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/releases/tag/v2022.07.04

#### Actual behaviour
```
Aug 02 21:55:10 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [INFO] [08-02|21:55:10.904] [5/16 Senders] Recovery                  block_number=14591991
Aug 02 21:55:22 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:22.584] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0xa3e960572d71107a4f181280c29aa25ab54620e442bde6ac7eed21a08b9729a4 number=15048283 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 221, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"
Aug 02 21:55:22 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:22.663] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0x75398de9dd8b176be7b115b64f41818483c4913e61a9eb72b2b644de26c44073 number=15048284 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 63, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"
Aug 02 21:55:22 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:22.745] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0x15793900645475fc461f17fc32b1b43a8c9e7c8e129a0a783d9e8294f3c82a0e number=15048275 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 50, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"
Aug 02 21:55:22 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:22.849] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0x31d7fd6ebd935e5fe21df5888b26dfb872a398fb9348e7d4f38696a971a39df3 number=15048276 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 361, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"
Aug 02 21:55:22 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:22.966] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0xbb50c79a8ddda4fb904fc2c790474d7e6a97fbee70d9f043b010f10f13a103cb number=15048281 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 405, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"
Aug 02 21:55:23 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:23.422] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0x2b51eeb6d0765dd088e746ef619f844cf52dc02f290c76f810a33c9b7cd8cc43 number=15048326 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 343, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"
Aug 02 21:55:23 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:23.708] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0x9bb62f9bb85ee588ead9084bfd12612046a4839ee24e20a0cf673f5d97fb0b93 number=15048325 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 228, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"
Aug 02 21:55:23 ip-172-31-25-127 erigon[139493]: [EROR] [08-02|21:55:23.793] Failed to derive block receipts fields   hash=0x0689df31d8d77699132bda8c537b2c5f44ce481f4c2b4cb26e6ff99e0407aa78 number=15048277 err="transaction and senders count mismatch, tx count = 53, senders count = 0" stack="[accessors_chain.go:976 accessors_chain.go:998 handlers.go:180 sentry_multi_client.go:599 sentry_multi_client.go:675 sentry_multi_client.go:640 sentry_multi_client.go:210 asm_amd64.s:1571]"

```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
`/home/ubuntu/erigon/build/bin/erigon --datadir /data/.erigon --http --ws --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon --http.vhosts * --torrent.download.rate=1gb`

#### Backtrace
````
[backtrace]
````
